title: "A Leading Cognitive Scientist Will Be the First Woman to Lead Dartmouth"
excerpt: "The Dartmouth Board of Trustees elected Sian Leah Beilock, a leading cognitive scientist and current president of Barnard College, as the institution’s 19th President last week. Beilock’s election by the board of trustees followed a global search by an 18-member committee drawn from Dartmouth faculty,"
